channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Brigitte Macron’s hacked tax file identifies her as a man: The controversy explained
What to know about Japan’s imperial system as Trump meets the emperor
Indian-origin woman raped in UK in ‘racial attack’. What we know about the suspect
Pakistan general meets Bangladesh’s Yunus. Is this ominous for India?
What's Burevestnik, Russia’s nuclear-powered missile that 'no one else has'?
Will arrest of 2 men in Louvre Museum heist help in recovering stolen jewels?
No longer a geopolitical blind spot: Rising significance of Western Indian Ocean
item.description: The Western Indian Ocean is where security, trade, and diplomacy intersect. India’s sustained engagement, naval exercises, and partnerships with African littoral states demonstrate a forward-looking maritime strategy

item.title: Trump’s top-down Gaza peace plan has all ingredients for disaster
item.description: The proposed Gaza transitional government, to be headed by the former war-mongering British PM Tony Blair, doesn’t represent Palestinians

item.title: Peace in Gaza requires harmonising Israel’s existence with Palestinian demands
item.description: The endgame of the Gaza Peace Plan will ultimately hinge on whether it can reconcile Israel’s existential security concerns with Palestinian demands

item.title: Here’s why there is no correlation between India’s move to cut Russian oil imports and impending US trade deal
item.description: PM Modi is taking a long view of the relationship, which is reflected in India’s calmness and restraint despite relentless provocation from the other side

item.title: How Francesca Orsini’s deportation is no loss to India or Hindi
item.description: The idea that Indians require a European to ‘teach’ them Hindi echoes colonial-era paternalism, ignorant of the vibrant domestic literary scene

item.title: India’s pragmatic balancing: Navigating US sanctions on Rosneft and Lukoil
item.description: A phased, compliance-driven reduction of Russian crude—paired with accelerated diversification into Middle Eastern and Atlantic Basin grades—minimises legal and financial risk while positioning India to convert progress into tariff relief and a trade deal with the United States
